books.title: Ars Moriendi
books.description: It is a heavy, black book titled "Ars Moriendi" -- Latin for "The Art of Dying". Written in 1415 by Dominican Monks, this tome offers advice on dying according to Christian philosophy in the Middle Ages.
books.author: Unknown

books.title: Common Household Charms
books.description: It is a thin, blue book titled "Common Household Charms". It contains many spells and cantrips for cleaning the house, as well as small home repairs.
books.author: Unknown

books.title: Last Will and Testament of Martigan Manwell
books.description: It is a thin manuscript titled "Last Will and Testament of Martigan Manwell". Martigan 'Mad Marty' Manwell was an infamous wizard from the 1980s known for his outrageous pranks. Beside the apportionment of his belongings, the document is peppered with mischievous spells of Martigan's own devising.
books.author: Martigan Manwell

books.title: Magician's Helper
books.description: It's a seafoam green book titled "Magician's Helper: Finding a familiar and training it, from whelp to adult". Written in 1804 by Horace Grimfalc, who was president of the European Familiar Society for over 20 years.
books.author: Horace Grimfalc

books.title: Scaly Creatures of the World
books.description: It is an embossed book titled "Scaly Creatures of the World", with decorative brass scales up and down the spine. It contains a comprehensive guide to creatures with scales, including dragons, basilisks, hydras, and more.
books.author: Muc Pomvari

books.title: Man or Beast?
books.description: It is a small pamphlet entited "Man or Beast?". Learn telltale signs of common human-like creatures. Never be confused  about the difference between a werewolf and a minotaur again!
books.author: Trag Mastata

books.title: A Summoner's Guide to Golems
books.description: It is a heavy, large book titled "A Summoner's Guide to Golems". Golems can be a summoner's best friend and also fight with ferocious strength. The master Mur Somdawu has shared his secrets on how to make the ultimate companion
books.author: Mur Somdawu

books.title: Goblin Hunting
books.description: It is a green book titled "Goblin Hunting" filled with sketches of goblins and lairs. Whether you're venturing into goblin territory or if goblins have raided your homes, you'll want this book. Learn how to track and identify the weaknesses of goblins to give you an upper edge in combat
books.author: Vos Virkawo

books.title: Gnome-Free Home
books.description: It is emblazoned with a cursive title "Gnome-Free Home". No frills way to rid your home of gnomes. While some may consider them a sign of good fortune, they will burrow into the ground and walls of your home! Get rid of them before they get rid of you
books.author: Hol Dreccero

books.title: Arcane and Shadow Arts
books.description: No legible text is shared on this book, but it has an ominous glow
books.author: Memmen Komlero

books.title: An Intro to Restorative Magic
books.description: It is a plain book titled "An Intro to Restorative Magic". Be a bearer of life. this book provides step-by-step instructions on how to cure over twenty different ailments
books.author: Tribruch Ovala

books.title: Unlocking Gaea's Power: Volume I
books.description: It is a book titled "Unlocking Gaea's Power: Volume I". Mother Earth has the power to move mountains and bring life into the  world. Take the first step with Ydrech Vovloto in learning how to harness that power.
books.author: Ydrech Vovloto

books.title: Unlocking Gaea's Power: Volume II
books.description: It is a book titled "Unlocking Gaea's Power: Volume II". Mother Earth has the power to move mountains and bring life into the world. The second volume of this series continues with explorations into oil, metals, and sand
books.author: Ydrech Vovloto

books.title: Freeze! and ther chilling spells
books.description: It is a sky-blue book titled "Freeze! and ther chilling spells". Did it just start snowing? Why yes, yes it did. From rain, to snow, to  freezing lakes over, this book covers it all.
books.author: Daurunvol Troloma

books.title: What to Do When Your Wand Doesn't Work
books.description: It is a book titled "What do do When Your Wand Doesn't Work".  Never be caught off-guard again. Whether you've been disarmed, lost your wand, or your wand simply doesn't work any more, these 6 simple steps will get you back in battle in no time.
books.author: Gei Halogu

books.title: To Battle!
books.description: It is a blue book titled "To Battle!", filled with inventory lists and descriptions. A guide to picking the right tools before combat.
books.author: Wai Meridi

books.title: 1001 Enchantments for Superior Gear
books.description: It is a small reference book titled "1001 Enchantments for Superior Gear". It is a comprehensive guide to all useful enchantments from invisibility to water-breathing to lava-walking and more
books.author: Hai Erana

books.title: Dress Sense for Every Wizard
books.description: It is a stylized book titled "Dress Sense for Every Wizard", wrapped in a velvet carrying cloth. Reze Gavrola reveals the secrets of style in this timeless classic. From accessories to robes and more, Gavrola's expertise will make sure every wizard knows the fundamentals of good taste.
books.author: Reze Gavrola

books.title: I Can Buy That!
books.description: It is a book titled "I Can Buy That!" in offset block letters with poor kerning. A poor wizard's guide to buying robes on a budget.
books.author: Vewo Onoha
